judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaeeer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment in this case is affirmed on the clear and concise opinion of the learned judge of the lower court.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: George J. Edwards, Jr., for appellant.
Harry A. Jones and Barnet Lieberman, for appellee, were not heard.
casebody.head_matter:
Schwartz v. Schwartz, Appellant.
Argued October 10,1934.
Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaeeer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
George J. Edwards, Jr., for appellant.
Harry A. Jones and Barnet Lieberman, for appellee, were not heard.
November 26, 1934:
